Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Handle to the tool local Tool = script.Parent print("IN SCRIPT")
-- Culling Service local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local r = game:service("RunService") Tool.Enabled = true
local starActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("StarActive")
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Value = player creator.Name = "creator" creator.Parent = humanoid debris:addItem(creator, 1) end end
function blow(hit, missile) if missile then missile:Remove() end humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) if hit.Name == "Head" then humanoid:TakeDamage(80) else humanoid:TakeDamage(35) end end end
function shoot(pPos, missile)
print("IN SHOOT") -- local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then print("HUMANOID NOT FOUND") return end local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then print("PLAYER NOT FOUND") end -- Spawning position of the clone potion local sPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position -- Have it spawn at a offset from the actual object position sPos = sPos + pPos.unit * 5.0
local xyz_rand = math.random(0.0, 0.1) missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(sPos, sPos + pPos) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) missile.Velocity = pPos * 90 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0.0, 10.0, 0.0) missile.Name = "ThrownStar" missile.CanCollide = false -- Give it a body force so that it stays afloat local missileFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") -- Give it enough force to stay afloat missileFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, (missile:GetMass()) * 196.1 , 0.0) -- To know who the creator of the missile was local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile -- Add the missile to the Workspace missile.Parent = game.Workspace missileFloat.Parent = missile
missile.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(hit, missile) end) -- The potion will now be removed from the world in 5 seconds debris:AddItem(missile, 5)
--Sound! ThrowSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ThrowSound") if ThrowSound ~= nil then ThrowSound.Volume = 1.0 ThrowSound:Play() end end
function onActivated() -- Tentative Lock if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false if starActive.Value == 0 then local character = Tool.Parent if character == nil then print("OMG! CHARACTER?") end local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("OMG! WHERE IS HUMANOID?") Tool.Enabled = true return end -- Clone the potion local starClone = Tool.Handle:Clone()
starClone.Transparency = 0 local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
wait(0.2) shoot(lookAt, starClone) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1.0 wait(0.5) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0.0 end wait(1.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Star = Tool.Handle
local starActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("StarActive")
local starClone
local vCharacter local myTorso
local duration = 20
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local bav = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bav.P = 50000 bav.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) bav.Name = "RV" bav.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 10)
bp = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bp.Name = "Stick" bp.P = 100000 bp.maxForce = Vector3.new(bp.P, bp.P, bp.P)
local sh = Instance.new("Part") sh.Name = "Shield" sh.Shape = "Ball" sh.FormFactor = 3 sh.CanCollide = false sh.Size = Vector3.new(8, 8, 8) sh.Transparency = 0.8
local shieldMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") shieldMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" shieldMesh.Name = "Mesh" shieldMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" shieldMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48598142" shieldMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.275, 0.275, 0.275) shieldMesh.Parent = sh
bf = Instance.new("BodyForce") bf.Name = "Float" bf.force = Vector3.new(0, (Star:GetMass() + sh:GetMass()) * workspace.Gravity, 0)
local newSH
local newBP
local connection
function blow(hit, char) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") --vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(char) myHumanoid = char:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(5) end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Value = player creator.Name = "creator" creator.Parent = humanoid end debris:addItem(creator, 1) end
function dissipate(char) myHumanoid = char.Humanoid while duration > 0 do newBP.position = char.Head.Position + Vector3.new(0, 1.5, 0) duration = duration - 0.125 wait(0.125) end if starClone then starClone:Remove() end if newSH then newSH:Remove() end if connection then connection:disconnect() end starActive.Value = 0 Star.Transparency = 0.0 duration = 20 ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 end
function onKeyDown(key) char = vCharacter head = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Head") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if head == nil or myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end if key:lower() == "x" then if starActive.Value == 0 then print("Activating Shield") starActive.Value = 1 starClone = Star:Clone() starClone.CFrame = Star.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2, 0) starClone.Parent = game.Workspace
starClone.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
starClone.Position = head.Position + Vector3.new(0, 1.5, 0) Star.Transparency = 1.0
newBF = bf:Clone() newBF.Parent = starClone
newBP = bp:Clone() newBP.Parent = starClone
newBP.position = head.Position + Vector3.new(0, 1.5, 0)
newSH = sh:Clone() newSH.Position = myTorso.Position newSH.Parent = game.Workspace
newSH.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
weld = Instance.new("Motor") weld.Part0 = starClone weld.Part1 = newSH weld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)) weld.C0 = weld.C0 * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) weld.Parent = starClone weld.Name = "ShieldWeld" weld.DesiredAngle = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0)
connection = newSH.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(hit, vCharacter) end)
newBAV = bav:Clone() newBAV.Parent = starClone ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 175 myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 175 co = coroutine.create(dissipate) coroutine.resume(co, char) end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end end
function onUnequipped() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
